disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.desc:
SMILE (Electronic Health Logistics Inventory Monitoring System) is an integrated application designed by the Ministry of Health as a real-time medical supply chain and cold-chain management tool. SMILE has been utilized by health and environmental health workers, logistics managers, and decision makers for health policy and programs in Indonesia to provide more efficient, transparent, and affordable healthcare services.
UNDP Indonesia supports the country in building a more inclusive, ethical and sustainable digital solution, SMILE.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.desc_one: This Privacy Policy describes how we operates the SMILE mobile application (the "App") and how we handle user data.
privacy_policy.desc_two: We want to reassure you that SMILE does not collect, store, or process any personal information from its users. We respect your privacy and do not engage in data collection practices that could compromise your personal information.
privacy_policy.desc_three: While we do not collect personal information, we may collect non-personal information related to the usage of the App, including:
privacy_policy.desc_three_next: This non-personal information is used solely for the purpose of improving the App's functionality and enhancing the user experience.
privacy_policy.desc_four: The App may use third-party services or libraries that have their own privacy policies. Please review these policies if applicable.
privacy_policy.desc_five: The App is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect or solicit personal information from children. If you believe that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.
privacy_policy.desc_six: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy within the App.
privacy_policy.desc_seven: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at
